            LayoutText {#text} at (81,0) size 767x99
              text run at (81,0) width 673: "The forest is primarily second and third growth. The area was saved from development because of its status as a"
              text run at (81,20) width 630: "federal military reserve; it occupied a strategic location for defending the former provincial capital of New"
